concept.title: Sample WebUI tests project with data-driven testing (Shopping Cart sample) in

conbody.p: This sample demonstrates WebUI testing with data-driven testing in . This sample also shows you an extensive use of custom keywords in the test case.
The Application Under Test (AUT) is the Katalon shop website: http://cms.demo.katalon.com. You can learn more about WebUI testing in this document: Introduction to WebUI testing.
